me hethuwa nisa 89 sita ada dakwa pawathwu parli­menthu mathi­wa­rana siyalla ara­gena balu­woth 89ye saha 2010ye hare­nnata kisima awa­stha­wa­kadi 113 sahitha sarala bahu­tha­ra­ya­kin yuthu aandu­wak nirma­naya kara ganna apata nohaki wi thibe­nawa. 12.5% sita 5% dakwa adu kirima nisa muli­ka­wama wechcha gata­luwa thamayi; sulu paksha saha sulu jathika paksha widi­yata aluth paksha dekak nirma­naya wela; owu­nuth parli­menthu mathi­wa­ra­na­yata thaniwa tharaga kara laba­ganna chanda prathi­sha­thaya matha aasana prama­na­yak dina ganima.
